hero.title: Veo 3.1 ‚Äì Advanced Text-to-Video & Native Audio Engine
hero.intro: Veo 3.1 is DeepMind‚Äôs premium video-generation engine routed through MaxVideoAI for both direct prompts and reference-to-video runs. Swap between text briefs and multi-image guidance, keep eight-second sequences cinematic, and lean on native sound design‚Äîvoice-over, ambient layers, synced motion.

overview: Route Veo 3.1 through MaxVideoAI to deliver polished hero shots with native audio. Start from a pure text prompt or promote a bank of stills for reference-to-video fidelity‚Äîthe same engine handles both so you can iterate faster.

promptStructure.title: Prompt structure
promptStructure.quote: ‚ÄúA sleek electric car glides through neon city streets at dusk; drone crane shot, slow zoom out in puddle reflections; ambient synthwave soundtrack + VO: ‚ÄòThe future is silent power.‚Äô Reference stills: front three-quarter, cockpit, rear lights. Vertical 9:16.‚Äù
promptStructure.description: Structure each run for clarity and fidelity:
steps: Define the scene and mood (subject, environment, emotion)
Add camera / lens / movement cues (drone crane, handheld, slow dolly, etc.)
Specify audio elements (voice-over, ambient texture, Foley moments)
Call out reference usage: ‚ÄúAnimate from stills‚Äù or ‚Äúkeep wardrobe & lighting consistent‚Äù
State duration and output: ‚Äú8-second loop‚Äù, ‚Äú1080p vertical‚Äù, ‚Äúseamless loop‚Äù

prompts.title: Electric flagship hero
prompts.prompt: A sleek electric car glides through neon city streets at dusk, drone crane shot with a slow zoom out as reflections ripple in puddles, ambient synthwave soundtrack with confident voice-over: ‚ÄúThe future is silent power.‚Äù Attach three reference stills (front three-quarter, cockpit, rear lights).

faqs.q: What makes Veo 3.1 different from Veo 3 Fast?
faqs.a: Veo 3.1 delivers higher fidelity, smoother motion, and Dolby Vision previews. Fast trims latency for quick drafts but sacrifices detail‚Äîuse 3.1 for polished edits and final delivery.

faqs.q: How do I keep framing consistent across a campaign?
faqs.a: Use the cinematic control presets (close-up, medium, wide) and lock tone styles. Duplicate renders in the queue to reuse camera settings while swapping scripts.

faqs.q: Can I blend Veo outputs with Sora runs?
faqs.a: Yes. Block sequences with Veo 3.1, then rerun hero shots in Sora 2 Pro. Upload the Veo frame as a reference in Sora to maintain visual continuity.

pricingNotes: Live pricing updates inside the Generate workspace. Check the current rate before you run a job.
